extendedInfo.description: "FREEZE" for CM7 Theme Engine******YOU MUST REBOOT AFTER APPLYING FOR CHANGES TO TAKE EFFECT!!!!************Requires TMobile's Theme Engine found in CyanogenMod's Roms**********Requires Root**********HDPI only**********PLEASE FOLLOW INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS IF THIS YOUR FIRST TIME INSTALLING A tHEME FOR THE THEME ENGINE********IF THERE IS A ERROR WHEN YOU GO TO APPLY THIS THEME PLEASE HIT "APPLY ANYWAYS". DOING THIS WILL NOT HURT YOUR THEME OR PHONE AT ALL.*****Free Version, We also have a Donate Version with more themed apps and icons*********Now wallpaper pick included*******Must install "Theme Chooser Wallpaper" App from the market to select wallsThis will theme your phone will over 1800 different images, hitting all system apps and many 3rd party apps.Including but not limited to:Android SystemCalendarCameraContactsDeskclockDocs (google)EqualizerFace BookFlext9FM RadioGmailMarketMessagingMusic (stock)News and WeatherPandoraPhonePlumeSettingsTalkYou Tubeand many more!This theme Will add a new wallpaper to you home screen(not working on the Thunderbolt)It will and a new system notification sound and RingtonePlease email me or follow me on twitter (@c_hale22) with any questions or concerns: mail.chale@gmail.com*****Install Instructions*****0. Uninstall any non market version you might have of this theme(will not apply to everyone)1. Install the app2. Open up the Theme chooser in your app drawer3. Choose "FREEZE" and hit apply4. You may get an error about "Assets", select "Apply Anyways", this is perfectly fine and nothing   will go wrong.5. Very important after you apply You must reboot for all changes to take effect.****Notes about Screen Shots. They are screen shots of the Donate version of FREEZE. "Free version is the same except fewer themed apps and icons.Id like to thank BSThemes my testers and all who supported me in this project.Follow me on Twitter or email me and let me know what you think and what you would like to see in the future.Special Thanks (These Android Icons made this theme possible)Bgill55 Skurtz1313Thanksdetox246djdarkknight96Frost_Designs_CorCor67s22Laner3dmanx

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: I\'m too inform the author it has been improperly compiled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks great...
reviews.comment: Looks great and nice icons, wish the notification bar icons were a little bit darker, its hard to see sometimes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overall very nice
reviews.comment: Overall it is very nice, unfortunately it isn\'t compiled for 480*800, so Nexus One users won\'t get the background. Also this transparency is a bit too clear for my taste.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: First class theme. Very nicely done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Intuitively professional
reviews.comment: From the moment I saw the screen shots of this awesome theme I knew it was for me! Its the best I have run!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s a nice theme. But just ... can\'t apply.
reviews.comment: It says it have problems applying it, please report to the author.
reviews.author: A Google User
